item.title: Workout
item.description:
I follow a push, pull, leg inspired split.

Push (chest, biceps, front and side delts)

  • lateral raises ss preacher curl
  • incline db press
  • decline situps ss hammer curls

No overhead pressing for now.
Lateral raises is the first exercise as side delts need to be brought up.

Pull (back, triceps, rear delt)

  • neutral grip cable high row
  • neutral grip pulldown
  • db rows
  • skull crushers
  • v bar tricep pushdown ss reverse pec deck

Legs (quads, hamstrings)

  • squats
  • leg curls
  • obliques

No direct calf work, rather I try to get in ~10k steps everyday.

item.title: Movies & Shows
item.description:
I'd recommend everyone to watch these atleast once in their lifetimes.

Arcane (2021 - 2024)

18 Jan, 2025


I think I speak for the majority when I say this is one of the greatest webseries you'll ever experience.
The storytelling, character development, animation, dialogues, score, everything is done masterfully. And with a total runtime of 12 hrs, it just feels like a long well-made engaging movie.
I honestly feel grateful to be able to witness it in my lifetime, and I am yet to encounter another series that moves me as much as arcane does.
Watch Arcane
